---
title: " Tabela de contigência / Variáveis categoricas"
author: "Yuri"

execute: 
  freeze: auto
  cache: true
  warning: false
---

::: {.cell hash='aula15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_87242a481d8ab2fd3a4d207595c59173'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

survey <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx",
                     "survey")
survey |> 
  count(year)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 3 × 2
   year     n
  <dbl> <int>
1  2009   265
2  2010   216
3  2011   185
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
q <- table(survey$residue, survey$inc_class)
chisq.test(q)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Pearson's Chi-squared test with Yates' continuity correction

data:  q
X-squared = 2.6165, df = 1, p-value = 0.1058
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
fisher.test(q)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Fisher's Exact Test for Count Data

data:  q
p-value = 0.09855
alternative hypothesis: true odds ratio is not equal to 1
95 percent confidence interval:
 0.4492084 1.0721250
sample estimates:
odds ratio 
  0.696718 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(janitor)
survey |>
  tabyl(year, species)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 year Fgra Fspp
 2009  225   40
 2010  187   29
 2011  140   45
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
survey |> 
  filter(residue != "NA") |> 
  count(residue, inc_class) |> 
  ggplot(aes(residue, n, fill = inc_class))+
  geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
curve <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx",
                     "curve")

curve2 <- curve |> 
  group_by(Irrigation, day) |> 
  summarize(mean_severity = mean(severity),
            sd_severity = sd(severity))

curve2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(day, mean_severity, color = Irrigation))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean_severity - sd_severity, ymax = mean_severity + sd_severity), width = 0.1)+
  geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(epifitter)
 
curve3 <- curve |> 
  group_by(Irrigation, rep) |> 
  summarise(audpc = AUDPC(day, severity,
                          y_proportion = F)) |> 
  pivot_wider(1, names_from = Irrigation,
              values_from = audpc)

t.test(curve3$Drip, curve3$Furrow)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Welch Two Sample t-test

data:  curve3$Drip and curve3$Furrow
t = -1.3773, df = 3.079, p-value = 0.26
alternative hypothesis: true difference in means is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 -1.3421436  0.5231436
sample estimates:
mean of x mean of y 
 13.38983  13.79933 
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_8633b845acd7af48a3bb08224bc03b2a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
tw <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t5xftb0xSRPNFhM7h_MiPNtwt2UFUcm9/edit#gid=1594889893")

tw |> 
  group_by(cult, silicio, hai) |> 
  summarise(mean_lesion = mean(lesion_size),
            sd_lesion = sd(lesion_size)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(hai, mean_lesion, color = silicio))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean_lesion - sd_lesion, 
                    ymax = mean_lesion + sd_lesion),
                width = 0.1)+
  facet_wrap(~cult)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_5a786aea09de6b226bdc5fdec0f62246'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(agricolae)
tw2 <- tw |> 
  group_by(exp, cult, silicio, rep) |> 
  summarise(audpc = audpc(hai, lesion_size)) |> 
  filter(audpc > 0)

tw2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(cult, audpc, color = silicio))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  facet_wrap(~ exp)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_004dba8a39beda3f770faeb6cb1652cc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov1 <- aov(sqrt(audpc) ~ cult*silicio, data = tw2)
summary(aov1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
             Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value   Pr(>F)    
cult          1  294.0   294.0   13.51 0.000712 ***
silicio       1 2363.9  2363.9  108.65 7.81e-13 ***
cult:silicio  1  526.5   526.5   24.20 1.62e-05 ***
Residuals    39  848.6    21.8                     
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(performance)
check_normality(aov1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.146).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.638).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(emmeans)

m1 <- emmeans(aov1, ~ cult | silicio, type = "response" )
m1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
silicio = Si-:
 cult      response    SE df lower.CL upper.CL
 Horizonte     1440 106.8 39     1233     1664
 Quartzo       1537 110.3 39     1322     1768

silicio = Si+:
 cult      response    SE df lower.CL upper.CL
 Horizonte      897  84.2 39      735     1075
 Quartzo        296  50.7 39      202      407

Confidence level used: 0.95 
Intervals are back-transformed from the sqrt scale 
```
:::
:::
